Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller are planning a group workout session and picnic over lunch at Hobbs Cafe this weekend. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Good morning Klaus, how are you today?
Good morning Maria! I'm doing well, thank you. I'm looking forward to finalizing plans for the group workout session and picnic this weekend.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm excited about the group workout session and picnic too. Should we discuss the details over lunch today?
That sounds like a plan! Let's meet at Hobbs Cafe for lunch and discuss the details.
Shall we say around 1:00 pm for lunch at Hobbs Cafe?
Sounds good to me, see you at 1:00 pm at Hobbs Cafe!
Great, looking forward to it! Have a productive morning, Klaus.
